Content.Text:
<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, good on you.
<PAGE>
I can't believe it. Have you been
fishing from morning to night?
You've got too much time on your hands.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Congratulations on your victory.
Just what I expected from my princess.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>But keep in mind that later
I'll have to punish you for
spending our date time fishing.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Congrats on winning, <MYNAME>.
Haven't you spent all the time with me
fishing?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I was thinking
what the punishment should have been
if you're results where bad.
<PAGE>
I forgive you, since you have good
results. But needless to say,
Make our time together a priority.
<PAGE>
This is an order.
You got that?　<MYNAME>.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
.........

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
.........

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
.........

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well done, <MYNAME>.
It is a pity we couldn't win
but I guess that's just life.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I cannot believe that you and I
were defeated. The people of this town
are pretty good.
<PAGE>
Anyway, we may have lost this time
but that doesn't mean that we'll lose
next time. Let's do our best next time.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Though personally, I'm not
really into fishing for competitions...
<PAGE>
I'd rather see my princess
laughing or crying after 
winning or losing.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
 I'm trying to comfort you,
but you seem to be happy
even though we lost.
<PAGE>
... What? You're happy
cause we were able to join in together?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Oh...my princess. You always
come out with things like that...
I don't know what to do with you.
<PAGE>
There's no way
I can reward you now.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>OK... We lost at the contest
but still I will reward you once we
get back home. Expect something good.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's just waiting for the fish
so it was boring
until the fish came...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>But once in a while,
fishing isn't bad.
It was a nice way to relax between work.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Moving the float,
and making those fish bite,
which had no intention of biting...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>That feeling is quite good.
I might get addicted to it.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations on your win, <MYNAME>!
You caught a lot of fish.
Very impressive!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, Congratulations!
I am so happy 
that you won!
<PAGE>
You really are too good 
to be my girlfriend.
I'm really proud of you!
<PAGE>
Next time I will win,
so you can be proud
that I'm your boyfriend!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
 Congratulations on your win, <MYNAME>!
You really are amazing.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Even after marriage,
my love for you
just keeps growing.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Let's celebrate together when
we get home! Since today is special,
how about I treat you dinner tonight?

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
.........

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
.........

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
.........

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It was a pity.
Let's try hard,
so we can win next time!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It was a pity what happened today but
I'm sure you'll win next time!
I can guarantee it!
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>But then
if you win, that'll mean
I won't be able to win.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Oh, yeah!　A double victory of me and
you would be great.♪ It really would!
<PAGE>
 It's settled! Next time I'll try hard
to achieve a double victory together
with you! Good luck to you too!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, it was too bad this time. Let's
forget about all this when we get home.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Let's spend some time together
eating delicious food and chat. You'll
see how fast your sad mood disappears♪

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
During the festival, Kosaburo was
catching so many huge fish!
<PAGE>
If the Fishing Festival was
not about the number,
but the size of fish...
<PAGE>
Kosaburo would be unbeatable!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The Fishing Festival was really fun♪
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>But I think I'm not really good
at watching the fishing rod for a long
time.
<PAGE>
I almost fell asleep...
and let the fishing rod drift away.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations, <MYNAME>. I'm impressed
at the number of fish you caught.
Very impressive, really.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Congratulations on your win, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH><MYNAME>, you really put in a lot of effort.
So I suppose this feels 
like the reward to those efforts, right?
<PAGE>
I must say I'm very
very happy for you.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, congratulations on your win.
All those days you spent fishing
were worth the effort.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>The only sad thing about it was that
you didn't pay any attention to me at
all for 3 days.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Well, then again I like watching you
trying hard to win, so it's alright.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Um, I'm happy,
but I guess it was a bit immature?
<PAGE>
When it comes to something I'm good at,
I tend to become too serious.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I'd appreciate it if you'd let
an old man like me win once in a while.
I can't win at anything else, so...

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
How about that?　<MYNAME>.
Did you fall in love again?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>...Err... I get embarrassed
if you nod
seriously like that.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, you're so
honest.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
What do you think?
Did my wife fall in love
with me again?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Oh no!
You don't have to answer.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I know
you're going to give a
serious answer, so...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>NOW, I just told you!
You don't need to answer.
<PAGE>
Don't tease me
too much. Otherwise, I'm going
to have to give a punishment.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I lost! Such activities
are not suitable for people this age.
<PAGE>
You're so strong;
not like me. Just keep on trying
I am sure you'll win next time.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
We both lost!
Never mind. It can't be helped if 
somebody caught more fish than we did.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>But I thought you might be
able to win.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Huh?
I'm not overestimating you.
<MYNAME>, you're so humble.
<PAGE>
That's what I like so much
about you.
...Haha, are you embarrassed?

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Perfect husband-wife double defeat. It
was a pity...anyway, there's next time.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>After we get back home. I'm thinking of
preparing all the food that you like so
we can forget about this.
<PAGE>
Hey, your eyes have lit up.  Weren't
you just feeling down? Oh well, that'
the <MYNAME> I know!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Well, I enjoyed it very much.
This is what I call
hobby and benefit.
<PAGE>
I have to say the Fishing Festival
exists for me! I can't wait to join in
the festival next year.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I really do like fishing.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Time is not limited,
so we can rest whenever we want,
and enjoy whenever we want.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Isn't this is luxury at its best?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations on your win.
Only you
could catch so many fish like that.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations on your win.
The passion you put into catching fish,
is just stunning.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I know you had been
fishing a lot...,
but this is just amazing.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Now I think about it, I'm so proud
to be the boyfriend of someone
who tries so hard at whatever they do.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>,
Congratulations on your win.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>You've been doing a lot of running
around these days. You must be tired?
<PAGE>
When you get back home, I'll make you
a special blend of tea that
will alleviate all of your tiredness.
<PAGE>
Tonight you can drink that
and have a nice rest.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
.........

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
.........

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
.........

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Too bad we both lost.
At least there's always next time.
<PAGE>
Please don't
feel discouraged.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Too bad we both lost.
This time I realized how difficult
fishing is.
<PAGE>
What?　You want to go fishing
as a date?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Sure, why not?
It's my pleasure to be asked
to go out with you.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That was hard work <MYNAME>.
What a pity for both of us this time.
<PAGE>
Not me,
but I thought you
had the skills to win....
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Perhaps you couldn't
spend much time fishing since you put
the time with me at a higher priority?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Who...Why thank you...
I appreciate your feelings,
but I don't want to get in your way.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Next time,
don't mind about me, and
put all your efforts in to the festival.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Looks like everyone
caught a lot of fish.
Splendid.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I couldn't catch as many as I wanted,
so I'm going to gather experience
and try out next year.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I caught some empty cans,
while I was fishing...
<PAGE>
It's something we don't see much 
in this town, so it must have been 
thrown away by someone else...
<PAGE>
Must have flowed in
from elsewhere.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>Whatever the case,
it's so sad that someone is throwing
garbage in the river and sea.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
That was surprising.
You caught so many fish.
You must have a talent for fishing.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>...What? Your not happy to have talent?
I can understand that.
It's not necessary for a farm owner.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congrats on your win! 
+S58I thought I saw busy
running about recently.
<PAGE>
I can imagine that's what it takes
to catch so many fish.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Huh?　I-I wasn't following you
around everywhere!
<PAGE>
 It's just because you were
moving around me so much!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
 Good on you for winning.
I thought you weren't at home as much,
during the festival.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>It's amazing that you can catch
so many. Don't overdo it when I am not
around.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>OK.　I'm so glad you won though.
Let's celebrate when we get back home.
Hurry up, let's go home.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I still can't believe
that I'm the champion.
<PAGE>
I'd caught so much fish and didn't
even notice. I was concentrating
so much, I didn't realize...

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It doesn't feel too bad
to become a champion.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>But most of the
credit goes to you, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
I stopped being lazy and
fished because
you were putting so much effort into it.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>So... The-thank you,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Looks like I won, <MYNAME>.
You didn't try hard enough
did you?
<PAGE>
...Nah.
I'm just kidding.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>This time I tried really hard too.
If I couldn't win with
all that effort, I'd be shocked.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Well, I hope next time
you can win too.
But I don't feel like losing either.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I wonder how many hours a day
the champion has been fishing.
In a way, I admire it.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
 It was too bad this time.
But don't look so down.
I didn't win either.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Ah...maybe we could go somewhere to
Although if you're busy,
I perfectly understand.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY>Huh?　A date?
Who-who-what are you saying!
That's wasn't my intention!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>... Um, well,
if you prefer a date,
then I'm fine with that too.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
 Not so easy to win, is it?
Anyway, there's always another chance.
So don't feel discouraged.
<PAGE>
After we get back home, how about I
make lots of your favorite food
and we forget about all this.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Ha ha, you're looking better already!
Is your stomach rumbling? We need not to
worry if you have all that energy left.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm surprised that there's so many
fish where they are not visible.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>I had my mind set to get back to work
after one last fish,
but all these fish just keeps rising...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Half way through,
I was getting stubborn to catch them.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Fishing is just about dropping the
fishing line, and waiting,
but it's quite challenging...
<PAGE>
I'm all tired after 3 days of this.
Well, it was fun anyways.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congrats on winning, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
I was confident about the contest
but compared to you, I was nowhere near
good enough

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, congratulations on your win.
It's amazing how you could catch so many
fish.
<PAGE>
To be honest, I'm a bit frustrated
about losing but if you were my
opponent, it was inevitable.
<PAGE>
I know! How about we go fishing?
I want you to teach me the latest
tricks for catching fish. Could you?

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congrats on winning, <MYNAME>.
All those days you spent fishing
were worth it.
<PAGE>
I saw how hard you worked
and I tried my best to compete with you
but I just couldn't get the win.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I'll lose my prestige
both as a man and as a husband
if I keep losing....
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Next time, I will win against you.
Be prepared for it.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
.........

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
.........

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
.........

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I can't believe
we needed to catch so many insects
to win the contest.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>The result wasn't good for either
of us this time but let's do
everything we can to win next time.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
The result wasn't good
for either of us this time.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>But I feel sadder
seeing you so unhappy
than because I lost.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Fishing involves some luck, so
maybe you were just unlucky this time.
<PAGE>
So cheer up.
There's always next time.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Come one...
where's that smile I love so much.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
We both lost but there's next time.
Let's learn from the mistakes we made
this time and try hard next time.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>...Before that,
let's go home,
eat something good, talk and relax.
<PAGE>
We were so busy fishing so
we didn't have time to talk much
right?
<PAGE>
It's important and
fun to put all our efforts
into a town event...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>But there is nothing
that can replace
the time with you .

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Before I joined in the Fishing Festival,
didn't think there was much to fishing.
<PAGE>
Just waiting for
the fish to bite
the fishing bait.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>But during this festival,
I learned about the timing in relation
to the movement of the bob...
<PAGE>
I realized the depth of fishing,
such as how much I need to pull
in order to catch them.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Previously,
I didn't think fishing was so much fun.
<PAGE>
I should have realized
how nice fishing is earlier.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I was able to see
all sorts of fish of
different size and type.
<PAGE>
I guess there is much more fish
that I don't know.
I learned a lot this time.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Congratulation for winning!
I'm surprised at the
number of fish out there.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>It's amazing you could catch
so many of them, <MYNAME>! Next time,
I'm going to try hard too!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations!
I wouldn't expect anything less!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>How did you catch
so many fish?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I guess you know the
secret places where
there are lots of fish!
<PAGE>
If so, I hope you
can take me there with you
next time♪

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations, <MYNAME>♪ That's what
I was expecting from my husband!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>...Just kidding.
Saying it afresh,
it's kind of embarrassing!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
.........

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
.........

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
.........

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
It was a pity.
 It really is hard to win.
 It would be nice to win next time.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Well, <MYNAME>.
We were unlucky this time.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>But the bigger the challenge,
the more worthwhile it is.
Instead, I'm getting excited!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I'm definitely going to win next time!
Let's get a double win!
You and I together♪

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I can't believe
neither of us won!
<PAGE>
We both worked so hard
to prepare for the contest.
Such a shame...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Now I feel like stuffing my face !
We can drown our sorrows
in lots of delicious food.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This time I was able to
catch fish I've never seen before♪
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>I was going to take a photo,
but it got away while I was
getting my camera out... I'm so sad.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY>But next time I catch that fish,
I will surely take a photo of it!
I won't let it go!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Yeah, fun fun♪ I can most
likely write a good article today!
<PAGE>
Additionally I got new information
about fish, so I might put together a
special feature on fish!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Congratulations, <MYNAME>.
Where did you find all those fish?
<PAGE>
I was amazed
when I heard how many you'd caught!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>,
Congratulations on winning!
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>... By the way,
is it true that you really love fish,
<MYNAME>?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>N-no!
I just wanted to ask!
It's nothing, don't mind me. <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congrats on winning, <MYNAME>.
You're great!
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>Although hasn't being
preoccupied with fish meant that
you've neglected me just a little? 
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>If you neglect me again, maybe someone
else will come along and sweep me off
my feet. Be careful. <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
.........

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
.........

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
.........

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
It's a shame that neither
of us could win this time.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>We all have good days and bad days.
So try not to be too sad.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's a shame you didn't win.
But I'm glad that you didn't
get hurt during the contest.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>You sometimes go to
dangerous places without
really thinking about it, don't you? 
<PAGE>
I was worried that you
might wander off to catch fish
and end up getting hurt.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You really worked hard.
You may have lost this time
but there's always next time.
<PAGE>
I know a way to
cheer you up.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Tonight, I'll make lots
of your favorite food
and you can forget about all this.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Seems like everyone
caught a lot of fish.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>I couldn't catch many at all...
Perhaps I'm not
cut out for fishing?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>But I don't want to
keep losing...so can you
teach me some fishing techniques?

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I wonder why fish move around
so much when we catch them.
The splashes weren't nice at all...
<PAGE>
My clothes got wet so many
times during the fishing contest.
<PAGE>
I wanted to throw away
the fishing rod so many times.
Isn't fishing so difficult?

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations on your victory.
Fish... So many... Amazing.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I lost...
I feel...a bit frustrated...about it...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>But...you were my competitor...
so it's...only natural.
Congratulations on your win.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I lost..I feel a little..bad about it..
but you won...
I'm happy for you...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
.........

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
.........

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
.........

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
It's a shame...I didn't win...
It's a shame you didn't either...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I wasn't able...to win...
I tried so hard... I'm so sad...
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>But...you didn't
win either...
We're in it...together...
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>... But is that...a good thing...
or a bad thing?

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I'm sorry... you didn't win...
I want to win...next time...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I would be...so happy if...
I could win...with you.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Fish...there were big ones...
and small and cute ones too...
<PAGE>
There are...more kinds of
fish...than I thought...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I got so sleepy...
during the fishing...
I dropped my fishing rod twice...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>When I woke up...
I was so surprised. I first thought that
the fish ate my whole rod...

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations on your win.
Wasn't it really hard to
catch all those fish?

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations on your win.
You're really amazing.
<PAGE>
I'm always impressed
at your success.
<PAGE>
I'll have to practice more
if I want to beat you.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>,
Congratulations on your win.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I still can't believe that...
my husband is...someone
as amazing as you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I also have
to act straight
as your wife.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
.........

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
.........

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
.........

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
It's not as easy
to catch fish as I thought.
<PAGE>
Things didn't go well for either of us
this time. Let's try harder next time.
